title: Ticket #4074: Some tests write multiple saveme directories
description: Some tests write multiple PID-named directories under their saveme directory for a single run. This isn't obvious and slightly complicated debugging. For example, lib_shared_port-check-ports_van.run will create two directories: one will contain a copy of the job log and the test's output, the other will contain the HTCondor configuration and logs used for the test. They should be unified into a single directory. I strongly suspect other tests have the same problem, they should also be identified and fixed; there may be a core issue that can be addressed.
creator: adesmet
